11.title: Susanne Hill

You trembled in fear, knowing your predicament of being broke and stuttered a response to the massive Nicole.

"You see, I just got laid off, and I swear I'll have it by Monday. You have my word." You stutter out.

"You said that a week ago, and yet here we are, with you in my palm. Give me one good reason to let you off this time."

"Please Nicole, give me a break, you know I can't go on the street. Just this once." You plead to the woman.

"Cassie!"

The sudden shriek scared you and made you turn around to see what happened, only to be met by a giant turquiose cell phone soaring down straight towards you! Its the same voice as the one you heard earlier. You look up and see a teenage girl with dirty blonde hair stepping towards your direction. She was wearing a long sleeve grey shirt, navy green short shorts, and a pair of birkensrocks with a threaded bracelet around her left ankle.

"Maybe dont scare me with a bug next time and i wouldnt have smacked your ohone out of your hand Sarah! You know i hate creepy little things like that!"

She was a brunette who was wearing her hair in a ponytail through her new york yankees ball cap. She was wearing a light pull string hoodie, ripped jeans and black vans.

"Omigod! Oh god are you okay?! Oh no I'm so so sorry! Are you hurt?!", Sarah asks in a panic. Cupping her hands over her mouth and kneeling down closer to you.

"Argh...! Yeah... yeah im okay. Its... aaahh... its my foot. I think its broken."

At this point, Cassie had come closer to see what the fuss was about and upon seeing it was you, shiwed no concern, only an eagerness to leave, like she was bored or something. Other people had would occasionally stop to see what was hapoening but didnt stick around for more than a few seconds.

"Sarah!? What are you doing?!", Cassie asks aggressively.

Sarah stands up with you cupped in her hands.

"What?", Sarah asks.

"Thats a shrink. You're taking a shrink to the hospital? They're little more than bugs now. You gonna wait around in a hospital for hours over a bugs broken foot? Just leave it here or stomp on it already."

"Cass! What is wrong with you?! This is a person. Just cuz shes small doesnt change that."

"Yeah? You willing to let your parents and your boss know you missed out on work because you were helping out a bug? You'd get fired and grounded girl!"

Sarah looks at Cassie. She wasnt sure about this anymore. Her parents could be savage and her boss at the YMCA hated shrinks with a passion. Sarah looked back down at the helpless little person rested between her cupped hands, with a look of sadness and concern... and regret.

"Umm... look I... I... I think you'll be okay here I mean... its just a foot. They owner of the sanctuary should be back soon, he'll help you okay?"

You couldn't believe what you were hearing. You use your elbows to drag yourself over to Sarahs thumb and grab it to hoist yourself up on your good foot.

"What?! Sarah no! I wont survive without you. Someone could take me and i won't be able to get away! I am a person! My name is Susanne! You cant do this!", you begged.

Sarah stares at you a little longer with grief in her eyes, then finally lowers you down to the ground and gently uses her other hand to pluck you up and place you infront of the sanctuary door. You drop on your ass and look straight up at the towering form of this girl, before looking straight ahead at her sandaled feet. Her toes wiggling due to anxiousness.

"Im sorry. You'll be okay.", Sarah said.

You see Sarah looking around frantically before her eyes lock onto something on the floor. "I'm so sorry. I'll be back for you." She said as she leans down.

Looking over your shoulder you see her reaching for a filthy sock. "Oh shit. No, no, no. Not in there!" You beg and she lowered you towards the opening.

"You'll be fine I promise. I left these here a week ago, and mom still hasn't grabbed them." She said as if that was somehow meant to be comforting.

Releasing you into her discarded sock Sarah held it so you slid all the way into the toe section. she carefully lowered it back to the floor, tucking it under the edge of the vanity. "Now, don't come out. You can't let anyone else see you." She said before standing back up.

You heard her open the door and walk out. "I had to use the bathroom Cass, try being patient for once." She snapped at her friend before closing the door.

Despite the near total darkness, and week old smell of a teenager's foot you sheltered in place. You would have prefers more mature help, but Sarah meant well. "This sucks." You grumble you yourself as she rub your sore foot. "She did a good job wrapping it." You point out as a positive.

After nearly an hour passed you began to get curious. Sarah never said how long you would have to wait. You began to worry you would be stuck in the sock for a while.

After another hour of breathing the putrid air inside the sock you decide to venture to the opening. Crawling your way down the cotton shaft you can already smell more pleasant air.

Lifting the opening of the sock you let in breathable air, and much needed light. "Fuck, I needed that!" You said taking several deep breaths.

The bathroom door suddenly swung open causing you to nearly jump out of your skin. You watch a pair of bare feet walk into the room before stopping in front of the sock. You crane your head up to see....
11123112222.title: A sock on the floor.

111231122221.content:
Realizing that the unpainted toes in front of you belong to Cassie made your pulse quicken. You did not like being so close to someone who recommended that you be abandoned, or stomped on.

Cassie continued on out of your line of sight. You could still her in the room. Pulling back into the sock you tried to ignore the sounds of a teenage girl using the restroom.

A few moments of awkwardness passed before the sound of a flushing toilet filled the room. You peeked out to see of Cassie was finally leaving. To your horror her foot suddenly dropped in front of the sock as she washed her hands above you.

"At least her hygiene doesn't suck." You groan.

The water stops, but Cassie doesn't leave. Her foot slides forward as she leans closer into the mirror. You yelp before you cam stop yourself. Her big toe is nearly touching your face.

Covering your mouth, and hoping she didn't hear you, you begin to crawl deeper into the sock. You pray for her to leave. Without warning the sock was suddenly snatched into the air

"Jesus, Sarah, could you be any more of a slob ?" Cassie asks as she begins to crumple to sock up.

You feel the cotton walls closing in on you. In a blind panic you start to cry. "Wait! Stop, please!" You scream out I desperation.

The sock stops collapsing around you instantly. "No fucking way." You hear case whisper under her breath.

You had a moment to regret your outcry before she sock was haphazardly shaken. You slide out and into the massive waiting palm of Cassie's hand. You find yourself face to face with her uncaring eyes.

"You're the same little bug from the street. Did you ride here on Sarah's foot ?" She asked almost amused.

You just nod, too afraid to speak. You're certain she can feel you trembling in her palm. She just rolls her eyes down at you.

"You're so pathetic." She said before noticing Sarah makeshift cast. "Oh my God, Sarah knows you're here. She taped your foot."

"Please. Take me to Sarah. I'm only staying the night. Then she's going to take me to the shelter tomorrow." You day, hoping to appeal to Cassie's kinder side. If it exists.

Cassie groans, her face uncaring. "Look that's not going to happen. You're just a shrink. You're pathetic life doesn't mean enough for you to get Sarah in trouble."

Before you can respond Cassie turns her palm over dumping you out. You land awkwardly on your back knocking all the air from your lungs. You're still coughing uncontrollably as Cassie's barefoot raises above you.

"You're just a bug." She says coldly bringing her barefoot down with force.

---

Sarah rushes into bathroom after hearing a loud thud. Fearing the worst she enters in time to see Cassie twisting her foot back and forth. As she steps back a small red smear is visible on the floor.

"What did you do?!" Sarah screams.

Cassie simply shrugged. "I squashed a bug."

111231122222.content:
The feet before you didnt quite resemble Sarahs, nor did they have the pale skin tone of Cassie. These feet looked more aged actually.

Suddenly, you heard the voice of a woman call out.

"Sarah! What have I told you about leaving your laundry on the floor?"

Your powers of deduction concluded that it was Sarahs mom towering above your smelly shelter, and it sounded like she was about to pick up the sock and dump into a laundry bin or, god forbid, the washing machine. You couldnt decide what to do. You had no idea how this woman would react if a tiny trespasser suddenly bolted out of the sock. If it were you, you'd probably think you were some kind of wacko with a fetish, or just a plain ol' intruder that is within the victims legal bounderies to kill as they see fit.

On the other hand, Sarah is a sweetheart. She had to have picked that 'shrinks are people too', mindset up somewhere. Maybe her mother was a safe bet? Maybe it would work out if you revealed yourself and explained what happened. Then you really wouldnt have to worry about that vicious bitch Cassie.

But that was alot of ifs. Ifs, that were out of your hands should you go through with them. Suddenly, the floor beneath you vanishes and the sock hangs vertical, as Sarahs mother plucks its hem between her fingers and lifts it and you off the bathroom floor, then begins to walk out into the hallway with it, causing you to drop down into the toe section of the sock, and sway back and forth with the motion of the womans arm!

You struggle to find purchase in such a chaotic place, with a broken foot, it was virtually impossible. All you could do was lean up against the wall of threads and hang on tight enough to keep yourself from being bounced around in here too much.

Suddenly, you hear Sarahs familiar voice. "Wait no!", she gasped.

Her mother turned around to see her daughter standing straight as an arrow with her hands cupped over her mouth. The look of shock on her face made her mother very confused, as it did Cassie who was standing behind her.

"Sarah? Whats wrong?", her mother asked.

Sarah looked from her mother to the sock in her hand atleast four times before finally calming her nerces enough to relax her posture and do her best impression of someone who didnt just overreact about a "totally unimportant sock".

"No... nothing! I just, uhm,... that sock... I was going to wear it out later so you dont need to put it in the laundry. I'll just take it"

Sarah watched her mothers brown eyes as they furrowed in disbelief.

"You're not taking this anywhere. Its filthy."

"No its not!"

"Sarah! Why are you acting so weird? Its a sock."

"Because its my sock and I dont want it washed!... Just give it back please!"

The two of them continued to argue while you were thinking on whether you should interupt or not. Your foot was really starting to throb as if it was ready to burst apart! You couldnt take much more of this torture. Perhaps it would be best to just let this woman know shes clutching onto a sock with a shrink girl inside it, and maybe see if she could stop being so expressive with her hands when she talks.

"What has gotten into you?!", Cassie said while putting a hand on her distressed friends shoulder.

"Wait!", Cassie chimed in. "That bug that busted your phone?! You brought that thing here!?"

"First off, that was you who slapped it out of my hand in the first place. Second, I already said I didnt bring her, she snuck in with me. But Im glad she did!"

111231122223.content:
You recognize the pair of feet before you even see Sarah's face. She looks slightly frantic, and concerned. She kneels down to speak to you , constantly glancing over to the door.

"Hey, mom picked today of all days to do laundry. We have to find you somewhere else to hide." She said as she reached for the sock.

Before she could grab you the door swung open. "Sarah, have you gathered up all your crap ?" Juliet, Sarah's mom asked, sounding annoyed.

In a panic Sarah plucked the sock and you up in her hand. "Almost!" She said as she frantically gathered her other discarded clothes from the floor.

You were jostled about roughly thanks to the teen girl's panic. The dank sock collapsed in on you, as she held her laundry haphazardly in her arms. "Sarah! Be careful!" You groaned under your breath.

"Ok, good. Give them to me, and I'll toss them in the wash." Juliet said, sending a chill down your spine.

You could feel Sarah tense up. Her grip absentmindedly grew tighter around your cotton dwelling. "That's okay mom, I'll take them." She said.

"You're going to do your own laundry ?" Juliet asked, her tone suspicious.

"Of course! I don't mind!" Sarah said.

"Really? Then why is this the first time you've ever offered." Juliet asked.

"I mean, I'm getting older. I should take on more responsibility." Sarah said, her heart beating loud enough for you to hear.

"Okay. I'll show you how." Juliet said, turning to lead Sarah to the laundry room.

Sarah followed in behind her. "That's okay mom. I got it." She tried to assure her mother.

"Now, why don't I buy that ?" Juliet said with a groan.

Once inside the laundry room Sarah was made to drop the clothes on the floor. You are thankfully well cushioned in the cotton. "You have to sort it all by what kind of clothes it is, and color." Juliet explained.

You begin to work your way back to the opening of the sock as the two giantesses sort the laundry. Peering out you see Sarah's mom towering above. She seems happy that Sarah is taking more responsibility. You wonder how she would react to the real reason.

"And that's the first load." Juliet says, and she starts the machine.

"What about socks ?" Sarah asks, glancing down at you.

"I usually wash those last, along with underwear." Juliet says, as she leads Sarah out of the laundry room.

1143.content:
"Hey, wake up!" a stern voice shouted at you. You instantly recognize it as the giantess that stole you! After being snapped back to consciousness, you open your eyes to a smiling face. She was actually a pretty brunette. If you hadn't spent the last few hours in her smelly shoe, you could see her as a nice person.

You scramble away from her, but her hand was around you like a wall.
"Easy there, not so fast."
"W-where am I? What are you gonna do to me?!" you ask.
"Well, what I'm gonna do to you depends on you. I could make you my bitch, or stomp you out of existence. Unless of course...you do me a little favor..."
"W-what kind of favor?"
"Well...look around."

You listen to her and look around you. The two of you were somewhere with a concrete floor, with multiple tough looking people around, surrounded by iron bars. You were inside a holding cell!

"By the look on your little face, you can obviously see we're at the police station. I guess your landlady caught me taking your shit and called the cops. Lucky me, they didn't find you."
"W-what do you want me to do?"
"Well, I'm kinda stuck here. But...you're small enough to walk right between the bars."
"You're letting me go?" you hesitantly ask. Your captor laughs loudly before trying to cover it up before others notice your presence. She doesn't want to share you.
"No, but that's really funny! You see, there's only one guard right now. That fat bitch that's sleeping over there."

You look over where she's pointing. There's an overweight cop sleeping in a chair. Her boots are under the desk, leaving her socked feet facing out. A ring of keys is attached to her belt.

"You're pretty tiny. So I say you should sneak out of here, grab those keys without getting caught, and then bring it back to me." It sounds like a pretty awful plan to you. First off, that would land YOU in trouble if the cop woke up and saw you grabbing her keys. She looks like the type that eats shrinks like you. Or she could just arrest you. Plus, why would you bring the key back to her? You could just escape on your own.

"Now, before you get any ideas, I'm still holding you in my hands. It would be pretty simple for me to kill you right now. Plus, when I get out of here I'd hunt you down. Understood?" You nod nervously and she smiles again. "Good!"

She casually strolls to the edge of the cell and drops you roughly on the ground. Shaking off the dust, you run as fast as you can away from the bars, just in case someone wanted to snatch you up. Soon enough you were halfway between the cell and the cop.

Now...what to do? Should you follow the plan, or tell the guard her plan? Maybe you could just run away.

"You're going straight to my belly." The southern cop laughed as she raised you over her lips, which she opened wide. You screamed as you looked down into her mouth, waiting for you to be lowered in. She took her time, laughing as she lowered your tiny body down through the air, giving you a hint of the environment which you were to soon encounter with the hot air emitted by her breath. This was not a good thing however, as she opened her mouth one last time, giving you a view of the room which you were previously sneaking around in, before she shut her lips one last time on you. You cried for help while banging on the walls, something you knew was just a tickle in her throat for the giantess who devoured you but somehow kept a gleam of hope, despite how pointless it was.

You were eventually dropped from the tube into a large cavern you recognized as a stomach, banging on the walls once again as you were waist deep in a disgusting fluid. The sounds were awful as you realized what happened in here, but the warmth grew more and more comfortable. Wading through the substance, your hand bumped into something. You picked it up, only to scream when you saw it was an actual human skull.

You bawled as you waited for something to rescue you, which you knew was impossible. Your mind grew more and more lazy as it became more cozy in the belly of the beast who swallowed you whole, and you grew drowzy. Eventually, it was too hard to fight, and your vision slipped, before your consciousness, before you fell asleep for the last time. You were soon digested, turned to nothing but fat on the ass of a cop who was big enough already.

1143132213.content:
For a moment, the massive officer only looks at you, inspecting your body. Slowly, she turned you around - and with growing terror you realized that she wasn't just taking a look at you. She was checking you out! When you finally saw her face again, her expression had shifted from indifference to a sly smile.

"You two love birds want to get a room now?" your ex-captress mumbled just loud enough for you to hear. Apparently, the police woman either hadn't noticed or chose not to care while she simply grabbed the burglar by the wrists and dragged her through the jail, back towards her cell. But she wasn't even paying attention to her any more, tossing her in without even giving her a glance. All her focus remained on you. And judging by the look in her eyes, you would have probably been in safer hands with the thief.

Then, everything went really fast. After making sure that the cell was locked, the police woman rushed away, through a multitude of corridors, until she arrived at a changing room. No one else was present - and through the windows on the far side of the room you could see that it was still dark out.
"Finally, my shift is done..." the giantess still holding on to you mumbled, "could've done without that action. But you..." she turned to you, a massive grin on her face, "if I had known I would get to get a hold of one of you shrinks today, I would have prepared something special. I hope you forgive me, but I'll need to improvise."
Out of her locker, she grabbed a large, canvas bag, and just looking at it, you recoiled. It was rank, obviously meant to carry her shoes and work clothes. The way it smelled, she hadn't washed it in ages, drenching the fabric in the stale smell of old sweat and grime.
Of course, there was nothing you could do to stop the massive woman from getting you exactly where she wanted you and only a moment later she had opened up the bag and flung you inside. While you still tried to recover from being hit by the smell at full force, she had already zipped it closed again, completely engulfing you in darkness.

The next few hours - were it hours? - were absolute hell. The woman wasn't exactly careful and thus her bag kept bouncing up and down, to and fro. The objects within, old socks, clothing, even underwear, slowly buried you underneath. In the darkness you couldn't make out where she was carrying you... but in your heart, you knew. You'd either end up in a pawn shop, or in her home. And whatever it would end up being, you needed a plan to survive...

After an eternity of being trapped inside the damp, smelly darkness, light flooded the bag and an enormous hand fished through the clothes until it found you and dragged you out. It happened so fast that the world blurred before your eyes and you couldn't quite see where you were headed.
But soon, the pillar like fingers holding you prisoner released you and you tumbled down onto something soft. Looking up, you saw you were...

115.content:
With a heavy sigh, you decide to open the pages of ads that you didn't want to. The section devoted to looking for shrink women. Sifting through the multiple ads, most of them were filled with horny guys looking for tiny women to pleasure them.

But after about an hour, you managed to find several ads that seem decent. The first one was a company looking for a miniature model. The details were that they wanted someone to pose with with other models to advertise a new project. They offer a couple hundreds bucks outright, plus a possibility of further employment. You assume that its a "possibility" because there's a chance someone would take you for themselves.

The next ad doesn't offer much information besides the fact that its an adult film. Apparently they want to use a shrink as a prop. Normally, this kind of work would be entirely off the table for you. The chances of dying during sex were high. The chances of being made a permanent sex toy were even higher. But...they were offering a five thousand dollar contract for shooting three movies. It almost seemed too good to be true!

Lastly, was an ad for someone looking for intimate company. Basically, they wanted a prostitute. Actually, there were multiple ads for that type of thing, but this one was offering decent money. If you were willing to cross that line, there was a lot of gigs you could take. But that's the most dangerous. The people that are willing to put out ads like this would likely just keep you as a sex slave without paying you.

After another hour of debating, you finally work up enough courage to respond to an ad. You type up a quick email and send your picture to...
115.title: Look into one of those craigslist advertisements

1151.content:
It might have been the lowest paying of the three, but at least "modeling" wasn't completely implying your fate as a future fuck toy. What mattered the most right now was to get enough money to cover your rent - and if they were honest, maybe you could get a stable job.

You didn't have a great camera, but you snapped a few pictures of yourself for a little "portfolio." Still, you made sure that the first one looked at least marginally professional. A simple picture of your face in portrait would have to do. A few minutes later you had written up a sparse C.V., put everything together, and send your application. Now the only thing left was to wait, and hope that you had made the right choice...

Only half an hour later, your phone rang.
"Good afternoon," the person on the other end sounded feminine and firmly polite, "this is Jade Morgan from 'Vision Marketing®.' Am I speaking with Susanne Hill?"
"Yes..." you answer hesitantly. Her tone was professional, serious. A good sign.
"We have just received your application and we are very happy to say that we would like to welcome you on our modeling team. I hope I am not catching you at an inconvenient time?"
"No," you stammer, "no, not at all. I just didn't expect you to call me so soon. Or, at all."
"I see. Surely you know that norm business is very hard on people of your kind. Our modeling shoots are chronically understaffed because of this, despite being one of the more classy spaces shrinks can find work. We don't take on just anyone, though. Mostly, we were caught with your prior experience in exotic dancing. With that as well as your photos, we decided you to be the perfect candidate for our coming shoot."
"Alright..." Alarm bells started ringing in your head. How exactly did exotic dancing relate to modeling? But before you could voice your question, Jade continued.
"We would like to meet with you as soon as possible, to sort out a contract for you as well as getting the shoot started. Would you be free in the next few days?"

You hesitate - Jade made this sound very appealing, perhaps too much so. Your instincts told you not to agree, to take back your application or make up something why it would be impossible for you to start work. But you needed the money and it looked like this gig was the only opportunity for you.
"I'm free right now," you say, nervousness creeping into your voice, "or the next few days. Whenever it's convenient for you."
"Perfect!" Jade sounded pleased. "Then, if it's not too much trouble, we would come and pick you up right away. We are already behind schedule, so we would love to get started as soon as possible."
"Alright then. I will be waiting"
"Very well. We from 'Vision Marketing®' are looking forward to working with you, Miss Hill. We will be at your door in an hour."

You mumble a weak 'goodbye' and sit down for a minute, stunned. What exactly were you in for? This was all moving very quick - another alarm bell rang in your head. But then again, you had never been on a professional photoshoot before. Maybe this was just the norm?
All doubts aside, you had agreed on the gig. The least you could do, was get ready. You packed everything important into an old, but still nice looking purse. Neither the ad nor Jade had actually told you what you would model for. You decided do dress casually, put on your best, black jeans and a professional looking white blouse. If you needed to change, they probably would provide the clothes.

Not soon after, your doorbell rang and you hurried towards the entrance of your apartment complex. Outside, an elegant black car was parked. From your perspective, you couldn't see who was driving - what you could see was the woman looking down at you. She was dressed in a sharp, blue skirt, barely reaching her knees and a white dress shirt, that was tightly buttoned up. Her feet were clad in black stiletto shoes and small, smart-looking glasses sat on her nose. Her hair was very blond, almost white, cut short on the right side of her head and brushed over, hanging down on the left side. Her eyes maintained a cool, distanced look.

"Hello, miss Hill." You recognized the voice - apparently Jade herself had come to pick you up.
"Once again, I wish to welcome you to our team. If you would," she lowered down her hand toward you, "please come with me and we will get started on your contract."
You knew this was the point of no return. You could only hope, that she was an honest businesswoman. Despite your doubts, you climbed on top of her outstretched palm. With a nod you signaled her that you are ready to go.
"Excellent!" Jade turned and climbed into the backseat of the car. She quickly told the driver an adress and you were on your way.

The car ride was silent. Jade didn't seem to notice you quitly stewing in your own nervousness. Her lips were curled in a cool, distanced smile. You thought she looked almost haughty - though you would have never said that to her face.
You came to a stop quicker, than you had expected. Looking outside the window, you found yourself outside a big, chrome and glass tower, the logo of 'Vision Marketing®' proudly displayed above the entrance. Jade picked you up without a word, nodded to the driver, and carried you through the building. A walk past a modern-looking reception area, an elevator ride, two corridors, and one opaque glass door later, you were sat in an office. Jade placed you down on the table taking up most of the room and sat down in a chair opposite of you. The nervousness came in full force. You were barely taller than the nameplate infront of you. It said 'Director Morgan.'

"Now, first of all, we will set you up with a contract for this shoot. Bill, if you would..."
You hadn't noticed him before, but there was another shrink, sat opposite you next to the enormous Jade Morgan. He got up from his miniature desk, taking a big pile of papers, and came straight toward you. He had a cheerful smile on his face and was dressed more casually than you - just loose jeans and a band t-shirt. A small, glittering pin was pierced into his nose, a thin metal ring through his left eyebrow. His left arm displayed an intircate tatoo. Had you met him on the street, you wouldn't have guessed he was a secretary.

"It's good to see you miss Hill! I think you'll fit right in here!" His tone was polite, but not as firm and definitly more cheery than Jade's. He grabbed your hand, firmly shook it, and led you to his desk.
"We'll just need a few signatures from you, plus some additional information. Do you want to go over this contract in depth?"
You shake your head. Simply seeing another shrink in this intimidating building made you feel much more at ease. If he had such a good attitude towards his job, your's couldn't be all that bad, right? You quickly signed all necessary fields. Maybe this would go well...

"Excellent!" Jade exclaimed after you put down your final signature. "Then we can cover the details of your work. We have provided a set for you and your modeling partner, a norm woman named Cory Silver. A professional photographer, Delia Tyson, will guide you and miss Silver through the shoot. Depending on your competence, we may consider you for future shoots, or even possibly full-time employment. The shoot will begin soon. If you have any questions, feel free to ask. If not, you could stay in our lounge. We will fetch you when we are ready."

Of course, one question was most prominent in your head. Something that you had, oddly, still no idea about.
"What exactly will I model for?"
Jade looks at you for just a second, a blank look on her face. Then she lets out a slight chuckle.
"I can't believe we haven't told you. It speaks in your favour, that you would still consider this opportunity without knowing such a crucial detail. Well, this shoot will be promoting..."
1151.title: the modeling gig

You were escorted through the building, being shown nothing of the studios before being brought into an office, where you were set on wooden desk, in front of a man in an all black suit.

He looked down at you before instructing the woman to bring you to

Soon it'll be just us and some chips in here, and personally, I'd like to be a bit out of sound body and mind when that- hic- happens."

Getting drunk one last time to soften the painful death creeping closer with each slosh of liquor draining into the giant's intestines. What hope was there for escape anyway? Rachel chuckles to herself proudly. Placing the popcorn on the coffee table in front of them, she leans into Carla to snuggle, her face resting against her thigh. Carla places you on her other leg, where they both can see you.

“Now, I heard reports that you decided to prank another student by entering her soup. I want you to know that these kind of disruptions are not acceptable at this school,” she continues.

“Miss Hall, another student placed me there. That was not my fault. Honest!” Rachel protests. You did not doubt this: some of the big but lower performers would try to take her down a notch in their minds.

“Listen, I don’t want to hear your excuses!” the principal admonishes.

Sooner than you'd come to understand you'd finally been swallowed alive, your face run into a seal of sorts. The muscular stopper, reacting to your arrival, shlorped over your head and mercilessly squeezed you through its portal before your natural weight carried you the rest of the way through.

The blast of muggy, acrid air hit first as you slid down the slope from the sphincter you came in from, followed by the sour smell of bile and vomit. The heat was more or less the same as the trip down, though the lethality in the air was more apparent than ever.

This was it. You were eaten. A fate feared by every living being that found themselves unfortunately low on the food chain. Horrific in the fact it hadn't always been the case. But here you were. Swallowed. Alive. And soon to be digested. The darkness was a greater insult, not even able to see the pulsing floors and walls that constantly knocked you off your balance.

"...Oh, no man, I def swallowed him..."

What? You could hear her still? The voice was muffled, but vibrated the walls just as the world suddenly rotated under you. You tried stepping up the slope to get your bearings, but the shift inevitably forced your compliance, throwing you over to the wall turned floor where the swamp of bile had now accumulated. You splashed into the frothy, sour muck disgracefully, quickly finding the surface and paddling to find a dry spot to escape the slurry.

"...Yeah, he was nice. Chewing would just be mean..."

The irony in her sentiment was infuriating while you were chest deep in her digestive enzymes. As you swam across blindly looking for land, your arm hit something solid in the mix. Curious, you pulled the odd, complex object from the pool. Feeling it with both hands, you found you could make out the visually recognizable features after a minute of touching it, and rounding your hand out over a thin, curved rod that ended in a blunted point told you this was a rib cage. At that moment, your foot also kicked into another, thicker bone against the surface of the gut. Now you recalled how many people she'd eaten today. How many skeletons had fallen apart in here? How many were around you now?

How long did you have?

"..Yeah, chill day, but let's konk out..." The world flipped over again, throwing you and the pool of mucous and acid to the opposite end of the stomach. Once again, you were buried in slop, slime, and more prevalent remains from her earlier meals as more bones knocked into your submerged body. Swimming to the surface, you found yourself in a deeper well. The stomach walls squeezed the slop to the point where you couldn't feel the ground anymore. Desperately, you swam to the surface, just as a tingling sensation started irritating your body.

It was starting! You broke the surface with a pained gasp, frantically turning each way as to find some safe haven. Swimming in all directions, you only found steep, throbbing walls that gave at the touch or pushed back against you. There was no climbing out, she'd turned to where the contents of her belly were all gathered into one pocket. You can't get out.

The tickle from the acids built to a light sting in no time, throwing you into further panic. You swam against the walls and beat them, tried finding a grip where they gave more elasticity, anything to escape! The gurgling cacophony beyond your prison mocked your attempts as your skin started to burn.

"Jamie! Jamie please!"

As if responding to your plea, the walls caved in, somehow squeezing around you tightly and raising the water level tremendously over your head as a rolling groan rocked her insides and shot upwards.

"*Urp*... 'Scuse me...." Just a burp. A single burp, and now he was doomed to drown as the stomach entrapped you completely. Even when it recovered from the expulsion of gas, you were left under the heavy mass of bile and chyme without the strength to swim up. A few bones were crushed into your sides, some falling apart after hours of exposure. You were next, the air was forced from your body, and there was none left to breath. You weakly floated down as the stomach walls bounced and throbbed around your acidic depth. Nothing to do but accept the darkness, and sink into her hungry depths.

"Night Sue!" her sing song voice resounded from above, muffled by the layers of muscle and organs as well as the gallons of muck.

'Goodnight Jamie...' was your last thought as consciousness slipped away.

This technology is experimental and too dangerous for trained astronauts to use and the use of apes in experiments have been outlawed.

However, your problems have been solved when the government ruled that shrunken people enjoyed no protections under the law. You have a great idea where to find healthy, attractive specimens that could be used for this experiment. You naturally go to the beach where both normal and tiny people congregate. You are about the get the lovely couple when you see some tiny kids nearby, and they too are Caucasian with blonde hair. “These lovely miniature kids maybe this couple’s offspring,” you think to yourself. “I hope so, I can use them as leverage while I train them,” you think to yourself “and I can have some fun at the same time.”

1551221.content:
You are a shrunken boy named Daniel Bohyer. You were 13 when the virus struck you and you assumed that your life was over. Who would even take care of someone like you, let alone resist the urge not to harm you. In your own mind, you were already dead.

You remember what it was like before you were shrunken. When you were a norm. Everything was better then, but you remembered the attitude your family had towards the shrunken folk. Total disregard and disgust.

You'd seen your father, mother, and even your sister kill shrunkens in terrifying ways. Under their feet, sitting on them, eating them, drowning them, all sorts of terrible ways. Some people had chosen to be kind to the tiny ones, giving them jobs such as cleaning, looking for lost things, some even had office jobs writing letters. Your family had mocked those people, you remember your mother saying how ridiculous it would be for a tiny to write a letter. It would take hours. This wasn't the only anti-tiny thing your mom had ever done, though. You remember your mom bringing home dozens of tines which she boiled alive for a stew for you and the family to enjoy. And now. . .you were one of them too.

Your father was 36, curly short black hair, and a little bit of a stomach. He was around 6'1. His name was James and he had made a living pushing for harder norm rights. He was a politician now, a pretty young one at that, that continued to get more and more negative tiny legislation pushed. Since there was no cure for the shrinking virus, removing those who had it was the only way to ensure that the normal population wouldn't be affected. In his eyes, people who got the disease were already "dead". They should be mourned and the affected "corpse" should be removed. Which he liked to do. . in the ways of most enjoyment for him. You remember that on your 10th birthday, your father had you play a game of "Stomp and seek" with the tinies. Together with a pair of hard heavy boots, you mashed, smashed, and obliterated a ton of people. To you though, they weren't people. . just play things. Nothing but mush underneath your boots.

Your mother, Sarah, met your dad in college. Even at the age of 32, she was a real looker. Blonde hair, pretty face, 5'9, the whole nine yards. Just like your father, she had put on a little weight, but not too much. Your friends would tease you too about her large DD breasts. They said if they ever became a tiny, being mashed between her two balloons would be the way to go. You always hated those kind of comments. She was studying to be a specialized cook. . one that specialized in cooking tiny people. She worked with a food shipment company to really understand the best ways to prepare tinies. She never liked it when they just diced up all the meat, froze it, then shipped them out. She'd eat it, of course, but to her. . the best way to truly prepare a tiny is to slowly cook it while still alive or even eat it raw. Tiny Sushi was something she really loved. Especially munching down on them so their innards would explode. You'd eaten quite a few tiny meals yourself, she'd even made tiny pizza. . but the tinies inside were still alive. The shrinking virus sort of had a weird effect. Sometimes it would shrink people to various sizes. An inch, five inches, 8 inches, a centimeter tall. It was weird like that. With tiny pizza, your mom had gotten the smallest of the small. You remember watching dozens of tinies running for their life on your slice of pizza as your teeth tore into them. It was exhilarating.

Your sister Beth, 18 and studying to be a psychologist. In terms of appearance, she took on a similar look of that of your mother, only a little shorter at 5'6 and only D breasts. She believed that when a person got the shrinking virus that a part of their psyche went away. Even though they would act as if they were normal, in actuality they were not all there. You knew why she did this. Just like your parents, she regularly participated in "tiny mashing" activities. Eating lots of them, crushing them, the whole deal. When she was a teenager, she had a very close friend name Xiaoyue. The two of them did everything together until one day, Xiaoyue got the shrinking virus. Beth decided to care for her, she cared for her for months, even with your parents attempts to "get rid" of her. But one day, while Beth was talking to her tiny friend, Xiaoyue forgot something that they had done when she was normal size. It was at that moment that the "hypothesis" came to her mind. You never heard what happened to her, but Beth said that she had "become a part of her forever", whatever that meant. What was worse was that the same thing happened to her first boyfriend too. She did whatever she did to her friend to him as well. You were glad though that she was rid of this tiny obsession. You were a norm, after all.

Except, now you were not!!


Standing on a table, you were surrounded by your father, mother, and sister. What was worse was that the shrinking virus had only made you. . . .

15512211.content:
"What are we supposed to do about this? If someone finds out about this at work, I'll be ruined!" your father says in anger lifting up his arms in disgust. He slams the table, rocking you around, you almost falling down at this action.

At five inches tall, you were able to get your bearings. What a terrible way to go though. . why did this have to happen to you!! You would never get a real job, or get a girlfriend, or get to do anything. You started to sob. You were surprised to see your sister's finger gently caressing your back.

"All you care about is work, dad!! Don't you see that we've lost a member of this family!! I loved Daniel, and now this happened!!" she cried right with you. You felt a bit weird with her touching you, due to you being naked. Since this had happened so fast, they hadn't even gotten you and shrunken clothes. . not that they owned any. It was harder to eat shrunken people with them wearing clothes.

Your mother had tears in her eyes too, hearing her children sob. "H-he. . .h-he looks cold. Reaching down to the floor, she pulled off her running shoe. She was wearing a low cut tank top and some running shorts as she had just been out for a jog. "I. . I know this is gonna be kind of weird sweetie." your mom said to you as she put the shoe down in front of you, the bottom of the sole facing you as it was on it's side. "But. . maybe one of these clothes can fit you."

You looked at the sole with disgust, throwing up onto the table. Smashed beneath the sole of her foot was 4 shrunken people, one that was about an 8 inches tall, and the other three about your size. Their mushed remains were so crushed that they just looked like 4 bloody blobs, the clothes still stuck to their body.

"You better take these, sport. I'm not wasting any money on shrunken clothes." your father commanded, his hand on his head, still irritated at this whole problem. He walked backwards, pacing the floor, trying to come up with a solution.

You walked towards the underside of the shoe, approaching one of the corpses. You dug your hands into the bloody mess and pulled out a pair of pants. They were covered with blood and guts. You realized that the legs were still stuck to the inside of the pants, but the bones had been mashed down to an almost powder. Your mom had really done a number on these tinies. You began mashing and squishing out the guts as the giants above still spoke.

"Honey, what about my sister Diane? She runs a refuge for tiny people. I think that. . well, maybe we aren't the best people to care for him now." she said, watching you still try to wring out all of the blood and guts from the pair of pants.

"I don't think so, Mom. Remember what my study showed? Tiny people have memory loss, cognitive behaviors missing. . I mean. . look at this. He's cleaning out the remains of guts. If he were normal sized, he would have refused for sure." Beth said, in between tears. She was still crying quite profusely at the loss of her brother.

You were still crying too. One moment the future was looking bright and exciting, the next. . you were trying to squeeze out guts from a bloody pair of pants.

"S-should we just. . . " your dad began, saying the words that were on everyone's minds.

"N-no, dear!! I. . I just think that maybe we need some more time to process what is going on before we make any rash decisions. This is a lot to process and I think we just need some more time."

You had finally wrung out enough of the blood and guts for you to be able to put on the pair of pants. You dry heaved when you opened up the pair, the smell being so much worse than you imagined. Fitting your legs in, the wetness from the blood was still very much on them. Putting on the pants, you realized that the pair was actually too big. Tying the crotch part like a knot, you pulled hard, the pants covering your body. It was good not to be naked, but you didn't want to do this again for a shirt. You thought that the pants would be good enough, although a little short on the bottom too.

"H-he. . " your dad began, " He seems almost like. . a norm."

The room filled with silence, only the crying sounds from your sister remained. You had stopped crying, your mind in total shock. You just lied on the ground, huddled into a ball. Waiting for these giants to decide what your fate would be.


Your life was over, everything was over.


You hated this.

"What are we supposed to do about this? If someone finds out about this at work, I'll be ruined!" your father says in anger lifting up his arms in disgust. He slams the table, rocking you around, you almost falling down at this action.

At one inch tall, you collapsed onto the ground. You were just too small and too weak to be able to stand. What a terrible way to go though. . why did this have to happen to you!! You would never get a real job, or get a girlfriend, or get to do anything. You felt yourself get angrier and angrier.

"I hate this!!" you screamed, "Mom, Dad, Beth!! Please!!" you screamed, getting back up and off the ground of the table in the kitchen. This was the worst day in your entire life. Tears filled your eyes as you shouted out to your parents in frustration.

"God," your dad said hearing your pleas, "A-all I can hear i-is. . little s-shrieking"


Your tiny outburst had broken your father. He hadn't expected that from you. Most tinies were on the ground or hard to hear if they were in his mouth. Statistically, it was a much lower change that a tiny was shrunken at only an inch tall. That's why it was such a delicacy when your mom cooked that pizza. It was very very expensive. Yet hear you were, a real delicacy.

Your whole family was just silent as they stared down at you. At that, you fell down onto the table again on your knees, tears filling up as you sobbed loudly.

Your sister started to sob with you, the silence being broken. She didn't say a word, but you all knew what she felt. Your mother bent forward, looking at you closely. She was so incredibly big!! You watched her gentle face look over you. Looking down a bit, you saw that your mom was wearing a low cut tank top. She must have just gotten back from her morning jog. Her big breasts jutted out a little as she mashed them against the table.

"I. . I don't think t-that" your mother began, speaking to the family "I don't think that they even make tiny clothes at his size. You know that. . well, he's actually quite rare."

Your sister's crying got louder.

"I know he's rare. I mean, he's not that expensive. What is his price, like. . 50 bucks or something."

"Yeah. ."

You lied on the table contemplating just running for the edge and jumping off. Maybe that's what you deserved. Here your parents were discussing literally selling you for 50 bucks.

"We gotta talk about this, honey!" your mom said looking away from you and towards your dad.

"I know, I know. It's just. . if work finds out about this, then what? I'm already up to here with these pro-tiny campaigns. If word gets out that my son has become one. . then what? If we don't follow through. . if we don't . . . treat him like we treat other tinies. . my career is over. I can here the other politicians already. They will say I'm a hypocrite. I know this is tough but. . . " your father raised his gigantic hand over you his palm outstretched and ready to come down on you. You screamed, getting up and starting to run. . although with your small size you weren't making a lot of distance.

"No, no!! Are we really going to do this like this!! If we do go through this, shouldn't we like. . let him decide?" your mom said. Your father moved his hand away from you.

He wasn't so sure himself yet.

None of you really were.


You had stopped running, getting pretty tired. You sat on the ground, still naked. Something entered your mind that hadn't before. What was it that you wanted? Did you really want to die? On the other hand, how would you even integrate in with the other tinies? Even amongst tinies, one inch tall people were treated the lowest of the low. Normal tinies would literally sell them to norms. That's how bad it was that even the community turned their back against them. In a sense, you'd become the lowest class possible.

Normal schools wouldn't even take you. Even though some facilities had ways for tinies to coexist, that same treatment was not extended to one inch tall tinies.

"He's a . . damn it!" your dad said, tears starting to fill his eyes too. It had been an emotional day.

You couldn't believe how fast all of this had happened. You realized that it was highly unlikely your family would treat you any different than a normal tiny. The big question is. . would they really go so far to include you into one of their "games"? Or would they do it fast and quick. Would you get a say in the matter? You sat there. . still in shock as these ideas came into your mind.

155122121.content:
The family just left you there on the table. They didn't move you somewhere safe or anything. You were left alone . . .with only your thoughts. You were so overwhelmed by everything. . you decided the best thing to do was just to go to sleep. Yeah, sleep. Maybe this was all a bad dream. Going to sleep could make you wake up from it.


. . . .

. . . . . . .

. . . . . . . . . .


You woke up, still only one inch tall. It hadn't been a dream at all. The hard surface of the table hurt your back as you stretched from the discomfort of sleeping on it. Some lights were on in the living room. You could hear the TV on from here. The news reporter was talking about pro-tiny activists who were trying to get more rights passed to tinies. You remember scoffing at those people and now you hoped that they would succeed. You remember cheering with your family when anti-tiny activists got a bill passed banning all further research on a cure for the shrinking virus. Now. . . you weren't so happy about that choice.

Usually your dad would have made coffee by now, but he wasn't here. You assumed that maybe with everything that had happened. . he had decided against it this morning. You didn't blame him. You were not totally thrilled by all of this either. Not one bit.

After some time, your parents returned to the kitchen. You watched your father rub his hands down his white shirt and his jean shorts, it seemed he had just eaten a tiny donut in the other room. They must not have wanted you to see them eating tinies before speaking to their tiny son. Your father sat where he sat yesterday, your mom sitting down to his right. She pulled a little at the purple silk nightgown she was wearing. It pulled a bit, making the low cut part of her shirt even lower. With one gentle tug, she moved it in the right way. Neither of them said anything, still waiting on your sister.

Beth walked in, her hair done nicely. She was wearing a tight white anti-tiny support shirt. On the front it read, "Best place for a Tiny". The pictures showed a pretty girl stomping down on a tiny, his tiny body crushed beneath her foot. She wasn't wearing any shorts, just a pair of pink panties.

"Beth!" your mom exclaimed at the shirt's contents and the state of undress of her daughter.

"S-sorry. . . it's all I had. I haven't done the laundry yet." she said sheepishly.

The three family members looked down at you. James took out something from his pocket, a silver disc and placed it down beside you. You had never seen these before, but you also hadn't dealt with a lot of one inch tinies. . except for when you ate that tiny pizza one time.

"This. . is a tiny detector. It's used for. . cooking. Normally, the way this works is if one inch tinies step off of this metal pad, it makes a buzz sound then . . burns them before they can walk off the pad. It's used to keep concentrated tinies in one location. Your mother has turned the burning part off though and we are going to use this to communicate."

Your mother butted in, once more bending forward towards you, her breasts mashing against the table as she hovered overhead.

"Honey, w-we. . well, we love you but. . you know that we have a certain affiliation. We can't go against that affiliation even if it is someone that we care about. I mean. . if your father shrank down or your sister. . or even I. . .we would all want the same thing."

"Exactly, sport." your father said acting as if you were a part of this conversation. "You know that we have to do things sometimes that we don't like sometimes. This is just one of those times, that's all. It's nothing personal or anything."

You watched as your mom's gigantic finger came into view, gently stroking you against the table. She didn't realize her own strength though as she actually started to mash you against the table, causing you to struggle in pain. She didn't realize that she was hurting you though.

"The way this is going to work, Daniel, is we are going to make you some suggestions. If you think a suggestion is good, you just need to stay on the pad. You don't need to move at all. If you don't like an idea and want to go with another idea, just walk off the pad. It'll beep and we'll tell you another idea. Okay!?!"

The finger pulled back, finally giving you a chance to breathe again. That really hurt. You had been taught by your parents that tinies didn't feel pain. So when they were crushed, eaten, or mashed. . they just died. Now you realized that wasn't true at all. In fact, if anything. . the pain felt even worse.

Your dad pointed to the metal pad and you reluctantly stood on it, getting close to the edge though so you could walk off if you didn't like an idea. It seemed like this was it.

Your mother started, again moving her body close to you, her face over your body.

"Well. . you know that I am a cook dear. . a tiny cook. So, I was thinking. .what better way than for you to go out . . giving back to us. I'll make you into something. .a dessert, a pizza, something like that. But I'll mix you up. You won't know which one of us will get you and neither will we. That way. . we can all enjoy you."


You stopped as she finished. Your family was waiting for your decision.

Over seven months had passed since the news of the shrinking virus had taken the world by the neck, forcing everyone on the planet to adjust to the very real possibility that someone they knew would eventually end up as a "shrink", the epithet given to those unlucky enough to succumb to the virus. There was no real understanding of how the virus affected its victims, except that the shrinking process was quick, happening within days, sometimes even hours, and in some rare but devastating cases, in just a few minutes. For most people, the integration of shrinks into society was an afterthought that they could barely be bothered to consider since the chances of survival for shrinks were about as high as they were tall.

In fact, due to the varying sizes of shrinks when they were found, it was almost impossible for governments the world over to issue standard guidelines for the care and safety of shrinks, leaving such decisions to the close friends and family of the affected individual. In some countries, the initial policy had been to preserve the rights of shrinks as normal human beings, meaning that interfering with them in any way would attract the penalties of the law of the land, if a crime was committed against a shrink. A spate of high profile cases soon followed, showing society that it was impossible to prove or disprove that any act against a shrink had been done intentionally, since every defense made seemed to rely solely on the act being an accident.

Scenes and stories filled the press with mass maimings and crushings grabbing headlines on a daily basis. Occasionally, the newspapers would run a human interest piece featuring the tragic story of a shrink suspected of being eaten, sometimes accompanied by the teary account of the person accused of doing the deed, as they pleaded their innocence with the public before taking their case to court. Emotions collided with hard fact as lawyers and citizen's outrage groups locked horns to decide the fate of the shrinks, as all over the world, communities battled with stopping the spread of the virus, while ensuring the rights of their members, both "norms" and "shrinks", were protected.

With no way to logically protect shrinks from the fates that could befall them at the hands (and feet) of norm citizens, most governments pleaded with their people to take care of those shrinks they knew, and protect them from harm, as they simultaneously voted away legal protections that would see norms being punished for killing or otherwise hurting shrinks. For some, the relegation of shrinks rights was seen as a massive failure by society, and no one was at all surprised to find the rate of shrink disappearances and deaths skyrocket soon after.

Soon, norms everywhere were forced to begin thinking about what they would have to do and how they would keep living in a world where the risk of shrinking was ever pervading. Families and friends would either bond closer together, or fracture as their members made their own decisions about what would have to be done. Life went on as normal for many though, for even though the epidemic and its threat to human life remained ever present, many had never seen a shrink in real life, let alone had to figure out what to do about one.

For Charlie and Lillian, the conversation about what to do was becoming more and more pressing, especially since Lillian was now late in her second trimester, expecting their first child. They had been married for more than three years prior to the virus and had barely been aware of it at all, as the news came around the same time they had realised Lillian was pregnant. It had been a turbulent time for the couple as they began to understand the magnitude of the changes happening to the world as news of the shrinking virus came to dominate the news cycle.

Charlie, a computer systems analyst at a reputable financial research company was soon working from home, although Lillian, a nurse, was still very much fully occupied with work at the nearby community hospital.

"I don't know where to begin Charlie, I've never told anyone," Lillian said.

"Do you still wonder what it would be like? To eat a tiny person?" Charlie asked.

"More than ever, and...I'm sorry Charlie, but ever since the news of the virus, sometimes..."

"Sometimes you think about me?" Charlie said, preempting her thought.

"It doesn't mean that I actually want to, but...I don't know...I just don't know," Lillian said, her voice beginning to falter and her eyes beginning to tear up.

"It's alright honey, you can tell me," Charlie said, doing his best to reassure his wife.

"It was all just fantasy up till this whole thing started, I never thought it could actually happen and now I don't know what I would do, whether I could actually look at you that way if you ever...if you ever caught the virus and you..."

"Shrunk?" Charlie said. The word had a sinister sound to it as he said it, and the reality of what Lillian was telling him began to really dawn upon him. She was serious, even though she loved him, and he loved her, she wasn't sure what she would do.
1553222223211112111.title: Lillian explains her desire

info.brief_description: Take up the Identity of a victim of the shrinking virus, an epidemic to the world
info.description:
Choose your role as a victim of the shrinking virus, a virus going around the world and wrecking havoc in the world. So far to counter the effects of the virus, the governments of the world have deemed all shrunken people, deemed as shrinks, unhuman, and not protected under any laws. In this new world, every normal sized person, deemed as Norms, is fair game to maim and destroy any shrinks that they may run upon.

There are nice Norms and evil Norms, depending on the person. Some families may treat the members who are shrunken as equals, and care for them, while others tend to take advantage of their shrink relatives. Schools are still integrated, and shrinks are still required to attend, leading to fun interactions there. Matter of fact, teachers are known to snatch some of their students for their own bidding themselves.

WILL GIVE GIFT POINTS FOR GOOD ADDITIONS


Rules

Due to some people who decided to take advantage of there being no rules, there is to be no characters under the age of 16 in sexual situations at all. I have deleted chapters involving said characters, and will continue to do so in the future if any more are added. Pedophiles deserved to be lined up against a wall and shot,.
